top_comment.text:
1953 Iran Coup - CIA Finally Admits Role

CLICK HERE http://bit.ly/13OIzC8 to watch The Young Turks host Cenk Uygur 
break it down.﻿
top_comment.author: The Young Turks

comments.text: Like Ryan Braun finally admitting he used PEDs.
comments.author: Barry Boyd

comments.text:
+Deni Makhoul exactly right. Most historically attuned Americans already 
knew this. In Iranian schools, they taught in the history books, even as 
early as the 1960s, that the US CIA was the one who put the Shah Pahlavi in 
charge, the guy who would indiscrimantly arrest, torture, and kill anyone 
who he thought was opposed to him. Every Iranian person knew it, and that's 
why they hated America in the 70's and took the hostages, and in 1980 setup 
an Islamic republic to counter the perceived (and real) fascist Christian 
dominated western world that, and why they have the new fascist Islamic 
government even today. But the US government just keeps on doing it again, 
and again, and again, and our government is doing it right this very minute 
as your read these words, in Egypt, Lybia, and Syria, and several other 
country we haven't heard of yet.
comments.author: Ramin Honary

comments.text:
What does it matter, by this point, everyone knew that but it won't change 
how they operate.
comments.author: Deni Makhoul

top_comment.text:
Coup coup for Coco Puffs Not only did the CIA finally admit they overthrew the democratically elected government, they released how they did it. "Using propaganda to undermine Mosaddegh politically, inducing the Shah to cooperate, bribing members of parliament, organizing the security forces, and ginning up public demonstrations."

I love journalists with opinions... +Cenk Uygur knocks it out of the park in this report.

Hat tip +Eric Weber
top_comment.author: Steve Pirk
